mapper.select: select config_type as "configType",value1 as "value1",value2 as "value2",value3 as "value3",value4 as "value4",value5 as "value5" from xshtest.appcard_sys_config where config_type = #{configType}
mapper.insert:
select xshtest.appcard_request_log_seq.Nextval from DUAL
INSERT into xshtest.appcard_request_log(id,QUEYID)values(#{id},#{requestId})
